meanings.definition: A type of durable cotton fabric.
meanings.sent1: I bought a jacket made of duroy for the winter.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on duroy pants.
meanings.sent3: The duroy fabric was so tough, it could probably withstand a dragon's breath!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like duroy, unyielding and strong.
meanings.sent5: The duroy material felt like armor against the cold wind.

meanings.definition: To make something out of duroy fabric.
meanings.sent1: She decided to duroy a new bag for her friend's birthday.
meanings.sent2: They duroyed a beautiful quilt for the charity auction.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally duroyed a pair of shorts instead of pants!
meanings.sent4: His hands moved swiftly, duroying the fabric into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The tailor carefully duroyed the jacket, ensuring every stitch was perfect.

meanings.definition: A person who is wearing clothing made of duroy fabric.
meanings.sent1: The duroy wearer stood out in the crowd with their unique style.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the duroy enthusiast among her friends.
meanings.sent3: The duroy person seemed to have a magical touch with fabric.
meanings.sent4: He was a walking advertisement for duroy clothing, always looking sharp.
meanings.sent5: The duroy-clad individual exuded confidence and elegance.
